name: Flappy Square (CESAR_dev)
description:
Hey !

This is my first game .  I created him with LöVE 2D and with the GameCodeur formation ! (https://www.gamecodeur.fr/liste-ateliers/) It is a Flappy Bird like and i hope you will enjoy it !

Controls  :

- SPACE to jump

- R to respawn

- ESCAPE to quit the game 😥
